price: 2 Nous t’avons révélé le Livre de vérité. Adore donc Allah en Lui vouant un culte sans partage.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَٱعۡبُدِ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُ ٱلدِّينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnā ilayka al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi fa-uʿ'budi al-laha mukh'liṣan lahu al-dīna
